function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Coronavirus sustainability on various surfaces, leading to potential transmission through touch.","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission through contact with contaminated surfaces.","Mitigation":"Frequent disinfection of surfaces, use of protective barriers, and promotion of hand hygiene.","Technologies":"Use of UV-C light for surface disinfection and antimicrobial coatings for surfaces.","People":"General public, travelers, commuters, and individuals in crowded spaces.","Owner":"Public health authorities, transportation companies, and facility owners."},{"Description":"Hidden transmission of the virus by carriers who are unaware of their infection status.","Impact":"Unintentional spread of the virus to a larger population, leading to uncontrolled transmission.","Mitigation":"Widespread testing, contact tracing, and public health education on asymptomatic transmission.","Technologies":"Rapid diagnostic tests, digital contact tracing apps, and public health communication tools.","People":"General public, close contacts of carriers, and healthcare professionals.","Owner":"Public health agencies, employers, and community organizations."},{"Description":"Effectiveness and limitations of disinfectants in eliminating microorganisms on various surfaces.","Impact":"Potential ineffectiveness of disinfectants against certain microorganisms, leading to persistent contamination.","Mitigation":"Use of multiple disinfectants with different mechanisms of action, regular assessment of disinfection practices, and implementation of enhanced cleaning protocols.","Technologies":"Advanced disinfectant formulations, automated disinfection systems, and surface analysis tools for evaluating microbial contamination.","People":"Cleaning personnel, facility managers, and public health professionals.","Owner":"Facility management companies, public health agencies, and research institutions."}]}
